title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather and analyze user requirements for the MolecularFoodAnalyzer device

title: Design the User Interface (UI)
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the MolecularFoodAnalyzer device UI

title: Design the Hardware Architecture
description: Design the hardware architecture for the MolecularFoodAnalyzer device

title: Design the Algorithm for Molecular Analysis
description: Design an algorithm for analyzing the molecular composition of food samples

title: Database Design
description: Design a database structure for storing food sample data and analysis results

title: Implement the UI
description: Develop and implement the user interface according to the design specifications

title: Implement the Algorithm for Molecular Analysis
description: Develop and implement the algorithm for analyzing the molecular composition of food samples
dependencies: Design the Algorithm for Molecular Analysis

title: Integrate UI with Backend
description: Integrate the frontend interface with the backend services for the MolecularFoodAnalyzer device
dependencies: Implement the Algorithm for Molecular Analysis

title: Test the Functionality
description: Perform functional testing to ensure the device functions as expected

title: Security Review
description: Perform a security review to ensure the device is secure and data is protected

title: Deploy the MolecularFoodAnalyzer Device
description: Prepare for and execute the deployment of the MolecularFoodAnalyzer device
